DataElement.preferredName: Intervention or Procedure Echocardiogram LVEF Percentage Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response used to indicated the percentage value of the fraction of the left ventricular end diastolic volume ejected with each beat using an image of the heart produced by ultrasonography.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Intervention or Procedure Echocardiogram Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects._An image of the heart produced by ultrasonography._The fraction of the left ventricular end diastolic volume ejected with each beat. The left ventricular ejection fraction is equal to the left ventricular stroke volume divided by the left ventricular end diastolic volume.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A particular course of action intended to achieve a result.

Concepts.definition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.

Property.preferredDefinition: An image of the heart produced by ultrasonography.:The fraction of the left ventricular end diastolic volume ejected with each beat. The left ventricular ejection fraction is equal to the left ventricular stroke volume divided by the left ventricular end diastolic volume.

Concepts.definition: An image of the heart produced by ultrasonography.

The fraction of the left ventricular end diastolic volume ejected with each beat. The left ventricular ejection fraction is equal to the left ventricular stroke volume divided by the left ventricular end diastolic volume.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for cardiac assessment forms, 03/07/18 JG

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the value as a percentage of 100.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Percentage; a fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A fraction or ratio with 100 understood as the denominator.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: v1.1 of VD replaces v1.0 to increase overall field length and include 2 decimal places. 1.14.2016.dmr
